VaporwaveFuneral.com

"You're going to die. Let's make it beautiful."

Plan Your Afterlife ‚Üí

VaporwaveFuneral.com is a pre-planned funeral service where you design your own afterlife as a low-poly 3D simulation scored to chillwave.


You take a quiz. You find your aesthetic. You build your blocky little avatar, pick your eternal playlist, and choose how your simulation-sun sets every evening forever.


If you want, we'll bury you in a LaserDisc-shaped urn.


We're not a religion. We're not a philosophy. We're a website that asks you to think about your death for five minutes while listening to slowed-down 80s pop, which ‚Äî statistically ‚Äî is five more minutes than you were going to spend on it this year.
